trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Newton
There was one other sighting in Newton on or around January 1st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed one at first, then another came from nowhere and flashed red lights to the other one, it really lit the sky red. A short time later there were more, about 10. They seemed to have a formation 3 in the middle one on top of the other, with 2 on each side. There were more but not in formation. They have been in the same place everynight, since november of 2009. They appear to have alot of color, red, blue, green, gold, and purple. I don't know of any plane that flashes all these colors.
Summary: strange lights in the sky, looks like cop cars in the sky, about 10
